description: This Java interface defines a repository for managing Token entities, providing methods for querying tokens by player ID and token index, interacting with the database via Spring Data JPA.

classes.name: TokenRepository
classes.description: A Spring Data JPA repository interface for Token entities, providing custom query methods.

methods.name: findByPlayer_IdOrderByTokenIndexAsc
methods.description: Retrieves a list of tokens belonging to a specific player, ordered by their token index in ascending order.

methods.name: findByPlayer_IdAndTokenIndex
methods.description: Finds a single token corresponding to a specific player and token index, returning an Optional<Token>.
